text: Joseph M. Minard is an American politician from West Virginia. A Democrat, he was a member of the West Virginia Senate, representing the 12th district from 1990 until 1994, and again from 1998 until 2013. He was a Delegate in the West Virginia House of Delegates from his appointment in 1983 through 1990. Senator Minard is the former President Pro Tempore of the West Virginia Senate. ==References== ==External links== *West Virginia Legislature – Senator Joseph M. Minard official government website *Project Vote Smart – Senator Joseph M. Minard (WV) profile *Follow the Money – Joseph M. title: Joseph M. Minard
